Home.heroDescription: At Naans Curries, every dish is a tribute to tradition and every moment is crafted for today. We bring together the warmth of Indian hospitality, the richness of timeless flavors, and the pace of modern life.

About.heroDescription: At Naans & Curries, we bring the richness of Indian cuisine to your table — fresh, fiery, and full of soul.
About.ourStoryP1: We bring authentic Indian flavors to your table. From traditional recipes passed down through generations to modern twists that surprise and delight, every dish tells a story of heritage and passion.
About.ourStoryP2: Our kitchen is where spices meet warmth, and every meal is crafted with care. We believe in honest ingredients, bold flavors, and the kind of hospitality that makes you feel at home.
About.ourVisionDesc: To be the most loved Indian restaurant in the region, where every guest leaves with a memorable experience and a desire to return.
About.ourMissionDesc: To serve authentic, high-quality Indian cuisine in a warm and welcoming environment, honoring tradition while embracing innovation.
About.ourValuesDesc: Integrity in ingredients, respect for tradition, and a commitment to hospitality that makes everyone feel like family.
About.timeline2009Desc: We opened our first kitchen with a small menu and big dreams.
About.timeline2012Desc: Moved to a larger space and introduced our signature tasting menu.
About.timeline2016Desc: Brought Naans & Curries to a new neighborhood.
About.timeline2020Desc: Adapted with takeaway and delivery while keeping quality high.
About.timeline2024Desc: Three locations, countless memories, and the same passion for flavor.
About.ctaDescription: Join us for a meal that feels like home, with flavors that take you places.

AuthResturant.title: Authentic Indian Restaurant in San José & Tamarindo, Costa Rica
AuthResturant.p1: Welcome to Naans & Curries, the best Indian restaurant in Costa Rica, offering a wide variety of traditional Indian dishes with bold flavors and fresh ingredients. Located in San José and Tamarindo, we serve locals and tourists looking for authentic Indian food, whether you crave rich curries, tender tandoori, or satisfying vegetarian and vegan options. Whether you're in the mood for spicy butter chicken, paneer tikka, or garlic naan fresh from the tandoor, our chefs deliver a truly flavorful experience. We also provide Indian food catering services across Costa Rica, perfect for weddings, corporate events, or private gatherings. Stop by our restaurants or order online for quick Indian curry delivery in Costa Rica.
AuthResturant.p2: Discover why our guests say we're the best Indian restaurant in San José. High-quality ethnic ingredients, skillful preparation by highly skilled chefs from India, and the process of serving from the foundation, but the experience at Naans & Curries is designed to extend beyond the plate. The fundamental formula of the Naans & Curries dishes is eternal. It consistently works according to the same script written centuries ago.

Catering.lindoraDesc: At Naans & Curries Lindora You can enjoy different ambiance; private saloon for group and events dining, green lawn fresh breeze seating, or cozy and relaxed sofa seating.
Catering.pinaresDesc: At Naans & Curries Pinares You can enjoy outdoor terrace seating with view of mountains or inside cozy seating for the cold evenings.
Catering.lincolnDesc: At Naans & Curries Lincoln Plaza Enjoy the contemporary Indian vibe. Breezy terrace or nature theme indoors, perfect for your mood.
